tool.name: T-Coffee to CIGAR
tool.description: Converts T-Coffee FASTA alignments to CIGAR strings

param.name: input
param.label: 2-column tabular dataset from T-Coffee
param.help: Columns should be sequence id and FASTA alignment

tool.help: Simple tool to convert FASTA alignment produced by T-Coffee to CIGAR format. T-Coffee output needs to be converted into tabular format using the FASTA-to-Tabular converter.
